title: mikeywith
author: mikeywith
created_time: February 20, 2023, 09:05:21 PMLast edit: July 31, 2023, 09:14:47 PM by mikeywith
content: *HK stock, DDP shipping to the U.S. costs $200-300 depending on the location and quantity  (shipped to your door with, no tax required on your behalf).*MOQ is 2 pcs (can do lower MOQ at higher prices).I will update the price list regularly as prices change every day, feel free to PM me anytime to confirm the prices and availability.

comments.author: Papillion
comments.created_time: February 21, 2023, 09:05:46 PMLast edit: April 19, 2023, 06:51:35 PM by Papillion
comments.body: hey can you post a photograph of the mining equipment next to a paper with your forum name scrawled on itthanks,a dog..?

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: Papillion on February 21, 2023, 09:05:46 PMhey can you post a photograph of the mining equipment next to a paper with your forum name scrawled on itthanks,Sure, there you go.Prices are still the same so far, with no update, only the M30s++ are almost all sold out and it's hard to get from the manufacturer, seems like MicroBT is going to fully focus on the M50 series.

comments.body: mikeywith sold me a pair of 30s+ all good.I have a thread about them in hard ware.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5437944.0still running solid as i type.

comments.body: Quote from: mikeywith on December 17, 2023, 11:19:02 PMPrice list update 18/12/2023Whatsminer:M50 118-120TH 12.5 U/THM50s 132-138TH  23.U/THM50s++ 21w 154-162 25.5 U/THM60 170-174TH  26U/THAntminer:StockS19kpro 115T        16U/TFuture:January Batch  S21  200T         $23.5/TMikey the s21 would be 4700 plus 200 to ship?

comments.author: mikeywith
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on December 23, 2023, 01:38:27 PMMikey the s21 would be 4700 plus 200 to ship?Hey phil, the price for jan batch has increased (since we are pretty close to January, it has gone up 2$ per THAlso the DDP shipping of $200 is for 2 moq, we pay pick up fees in hong kong and a minimum weight of 25kg is imposed by the shipper, so 1 pc would cost nearly as much as 2 pcs for shipping.Anyway, PM, i will try to sort it something out.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: What are your current L7 prices? say 2 pieces ship to New Jersey USA
